{"name": "Urban Ministry Center/Roof Above", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Basic services: showers, laundry, restrooms, device charging, phone, fax, and mail
On-site nurse, prescription assistance, over-the-counter medications
Help with obtaining ID, bus passes (for verified work/medical appointment), and more
Connections to community resources
First step to emergency shelter and housing", "email": "", "url": "urbanministrycenter.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "945 North College Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Lockwood", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28206", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2329175, "longitude": -80.8330138}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 347-0278", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:15", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:15", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:15", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:15", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:15", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:15", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "15:15", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}]}
